channel.title: Blog comment integration with Discourse
channel.description: I have set up Discourse integration with the Gauntlet Blog. So now when a blog entry is first visited a topic for the blog comments will be generated in the #gauntlet-community:blog-comments category. This will mean that over time there might be some "old news" posts showing up in your list of New/Unread topics. I apologize for the "spam" - but it is just how it will be for a while.
